name: Starpoint Gemini Warlords
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  appid: 419480
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/StarpointGeminiWarlords/Launch Starpoint Gemini
    Warlords.lnk
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG Games/StarpointGeminiWarlords"
    description: Installing Starpoint Gemini Warlords
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  terminal: true
wine:
  Desktop: false
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
